column1: Ned helped him to harness Rover in it like a horse
column2: and Jack climbed in and took the reins. "Get up!" said Jack
column3: and away they went out into the yard and on into a big field. But just then a little rabbit started up in front of them
column4: and the minute Rover saw it
column5: he began to race after the rabbit. Poor Jack couldn't hold him at all. Round and round they went
column8: and they ran! Jack called out
column11: Rover!" But Rover didn't stop. He wanted to catch the rabbit and he forgot about Jack.At last the rabbit ran toward a hole under the wall
column12: where Rover could not get him. But Rover dashed after him as fast as he could go. "Bumpity-bump" went the little wagon
column13: and just as Rover missed the rabbit
column14: the wheel struck a big stone and poor Jack tumbled out on the ground. But he didn't cry.
